participant_1.background:
I'm a diligent student who enjoys working hard to achieve my goals.
When I need a break from the world, I put on my earphones and listen to folk metal.
i live alone with my dog.
I don't want to disclose my wealth.
i am a college drop out.

participant_2.background:
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great! Just finished a few assignments and I'm looking forward to a break.
That's great! I'm training for a triathlon this weekend and I'm nervous but excited!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to do a triathlon but I'm not sure if I'm in shape enough.
It's never too late to start! I've been training for a few months now and I'm still not in the best shape, but I'm getting there!
I'm impressed! I'm not sure if I have the discipline to train for something like that.
It's definitely a challenge, but it's also really rewarding!
I'm sure it is! I'm just not sure if I'm up for it.
You never know until you try! And if you don't like it, you can always stop.
That's true. Maybe I'll give it a try!
I'd love to have a training buddy!
That would be great! I'll let you know if I decide to do it.
